items.sentence: You should get into the habit of going to bed early.
Tom has had many of the same problems that I've had.
Eighty percent of statistics are completely made up.
I'm wearing the jacket that I bought three days ago.
Tom and Mary spent the evening drinking and talking.
Are you sure it was Tom you saw crossing the street?
Tom isn't too busy to help. He just doesn't want to.
There are a lot of things that we still need to buy.
Tom was the only person that didn't want to do that.
Tom is wearing the pair of socks that Mary gave him.
